readable.title: 3529314899_b4e533bb76
readable.content: A hockey player in white tries to steal the puck from another player in red . A hockey player wearing a red uniform reaches for the puck as others follow . A red-uniformed hockey player is attempting to control the puck while two white-suited hockey players try to disrupt him . People playing hockey on ice . Two opposing hockey players make a play for the puck with opposing fans and team members watching .
